channel.title: Upcoming shows on Income Tax Refund
channel.description: Recent content in Upcoming shows on Income Tax Refund

item.title: Rắn Cạp Đuôi + syw
item.description: ITR presents: 26 July, 2024 @ TV Studio Ost doors 19h30 startttt 20h00 Rắn Cạp Đuôi (free electronic noise rock / Ho Chi Minh City) Rắn Cạp Đuôi is a collective of the Vietnamese artist Đỗ Tấn Sĩ, Phạm Thế Vũ, Zach Sch, Đỗ Hoàng Tuấn Anh, and Vuong Thien doing unexpected noise rock mayhem, glitched-out bracing DJ sets, captivating situanist performances and all that. They have released on Subtext Recordings and are part of Gãy collective from Sài Gòn.

item.title: Atol Atol Atol + Nape Neck + Senthulà + Luna Vega + Neuköllner Speed Dating Club
item.description: ITR + Annoyed By Death + OMNI present: Luna Vega (Leipzig) Luna Vega’s first studio efforts involved just a preset drum machine + Vermona organ, often nodding to 70s proto-electronic pioneers. The project has now evolved into a 3piece live band: repetitive drum machine patterns, multi-layered organs, wonky synths, 90’s psych guitars. Spaced-out nostalgia-powered grooves for the heads of the 2020’s. BC IG Neuköllner Speed Dating Club (Leipzig) …started as a solo project based around samplers, drum machines, synthesizers and keyboards, but now performs with a constantly changing line-up of various instruments.

item.title: Lemongrab + Doc FLippers + Neon Lies
item.description: ITR presents: 18.6.24 @ TV Studio Ost doors 19h30 startttt 20h15 upstairs Lemongrab Doc FLippers [curfew upstairs 22h00] downstairs Neon Lies more info coming soon

item.title: Ryan Davis + Ned Collette + Greedy Vultures
item.description: ITR presents: the grand BBG hangout w/ RYAN DAVIS (solo, Kentucky USA) // Americana, f.f.o. Will Oldham, David Berman etc.) Dancing on the Edge (Sophomore Lounge, 2023) p4k review dad rock testimonial NED COLLETTE (solo, avantgarde folk) Jokes and Trials (Sophomore Lounge, 2022) GREEDY VULTURES (feat. members of Highway Patrol and Stalag) bc more info coming soon dress suggestion by Aranzazu Morena

item.title: Heavenphetamine + Luna Vega + Neuköllner Speed Dating Club
item.description: Income Tax Refund presents: psych-pop / kraut / experimental evening in Leipzig Ost THURSDAY, May 30th @ XonXanXop | Doors: 19:30 | | Start: 20:00 | Heavenphetamine (Georgia/Ukraine) Heavenphetamine is a Japanese krautrock/postpunk duo composed of Hiroki (keyboard/vocals) and Sara (drums/vocals), sometimes supported by flautist Kira Krempova. Described as a blend of Krautrock and Post-Punk, their musicality strongly reflects the influence of Western indie music. Simultaneously, the underlying Japanese melodies, beats, and Japanese lyrics contribute to crafting an exceptionally exotic sonic landscape.

item.title: Ulla Suspekt + Polster + Senthulà
item.description: ITR presents: Ulla Suspekt (NDW witch house / Nürnberg / Verydeeprecords) = bass player, producer and one half of the infamous Taxi Lotta U (album, 2023) Polster (Halle/Saale) = Iva Svoboda + Wilm Beckhoff Sentuhlà (ritualistic riddims / Valencia / Abstrakce Records) »Sentuhlà is one of the many aliases of musical jack of all trades José Guerrero, a long standing figure in the already rich underground scene of Valencia. In this solo excursion he explores the vast possibilities of mechanical repetition, the machine funk of dirtbag rhythms and proper boogie DIY synth music, sculpting a syncopated sound that is both modern and atavistic.
